subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: With a late barrage of 3-pointers Thursday night the Knicks overcame the Charlotte Bobcats. With the victory they improved to 15-20 and moved in ninth place in their conference.
snippet: With a late barrage of 3-pointers Thursday night the Knicks overcame the Charlotte Bobcats. With the victory they improved to 15-20 and moved in ninth place in their conference.
